hanzi-su-wiki:
彩

Значения

Окрашивать, раскрашивать

Мнемоника

Брать 爫 от лакового дерева 木 сок и штрихами 彡 наносить на поверхность.
purpleculture_pinyin:
cǎi
(bright) color; variety; applause; applaud; lottery prize
(яркий цвет; разнообразие; аплодисменты; аплодировать; лотерейный приз
rtega_mnemonic:
彩彩RShue, colour, variegated colours
  • hand gathering 采 flowers with amazing variation of colours and stripes 彡
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 采 indicates the sound; 彡 (hair) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
色彩 [ sè cǎi ]: tint; coloring; coloration; (fig.) flavor; character
精彩 [ jīng cǎi ]: wonderful; marvelous; brilliant
光彩 [ guāng cǎi ]: luster; splendor; radiance; brilliance
丰富多彩 [ fēng fù duō cǎi ]: richly colorful
彩电 [ cǎi diàn ]: color TV
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 采 [ cǎi ] to collect, to gather; to pick, to pluck
    • 彡 [ shān ] hair; sunlight
heisig_chinese_memo: You notice a colouring with a certain hue in a tree. You look more carefully and you make out the shape of a bird (claws).
heisig_constituent: coloring, claw, vulture, grab, tree, wood, shape
koohiiStory1: In Sydney we occasionally get exotic birds. You first notice a colouring in a tree. You look more carefully and you make out the shape of a bird (here represented by its claws).
koohiiStory2: When coloring something in you grab the crayon of choice to fill in the shapes.
jp_example_words: 色彩(しきさい): colour, hue, tints
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You use a cleat to climb a tree and your hair gets the same coloring as the foliage because your hair is like a chameleon. The coloring of your hair changes to whatever color is around you, so you use your cleats to climb trees to make your hair turn green and brown, and in the fall, yellow and orange and red!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine digging your cleats into the bark of the tree until you get high enough for your hair to start coloring itself tree colors. It might be a lot of work, but it's worth it.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This cool coloring can only happen because you turned yourself into a cyborg (さい). Your hair and scalp are now made of high tech parts, not human ones.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You couldn't take the pain of losing your cyborg, so you've become one. Your robo-hair can change its coloring, but soon you'll be even more cyborg-y than before!
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 采 (とる、いろどり、サイ выбирать, собирать).
Ru_trainchinese:
cǎi: (графема) цвет
cǎi: (графема) выигрыш (напр., в лотерее); аплодисменты, овация; кровь из раны; цветной шелк
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the furry (彡) dice (采) are colored
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You notice a colouring with a certain hue in a tree. You look more carefully and you make out the shape of a bird (claws).
humanum_full_description_en:
From "彡", " Cai " sound, the original meaning is literary talent. "Said Wen": "Articles. From 彡, picking sound." "Book of Jin-Xiahou Zhan Chuan Zhan": "Chan is called Nonghan, and the tape is carved in color.

" Color " often means brilliance and color. "Selected Works‧Song Yu "Goddess Fu"": "The eyes are slightly stern, wonderful and brilliant, and the ambition is out, and it is invincible." Li Shan's note: "Slightly look down on the eyes, the spirit is also taught."

" Color " can mean colored ornaments. "Sui Shu·Music History": "The chariots are hanging on the color, and the Dang is brilliant."

" Color " also indicates the winning color of the dice roll in the game. Tang Duancheng's "Youyang Miscellaneous Miscellaneous-Strange Skills": "The layman of the Song Dynasty said that the dice-throwing curse cloud "Yi Tie Mi Tie Mi Jie Luo Tie" was chanted thousands of times, and the color was made with the call.

" Cai " also refers to the blood shed after being injured. "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters" Chapter 6: "At that time, San'er was by the side staring blankly at the son's chest. It depends on the sharpness of the knife."
humanum_short_description_en: From "彡", " take " sound, the original meaning is literary talent.
humanum_full_description:
從「彡」，「采」聲，本義為文采。《說文》：「文章也。从彡，采聲。」《晉書‧夏侯湛傳贊》：「湛稱弄翰，縟彩雕煥。」

　　「彩」常表示光彩、色彩。《文選‧宋玉〈神女賦〉》：「目略微眄，精彩相授，志態橫出，不可勝記。」李善注：「目略輕看，精神光采相授與也。」

　　「彩」可表示彩色飾物。《隋書‧音樂志中》：「車輅垂彩，旒袞騰輝。」

　　「彩」也表示博戲中擲骰子的勝色。唐段成式《酉陽雜俎‧怪術》：「宋居士說擲骰子咒云『伊諦彌諦彌揭羅諦』，念滿萬遍，彩隨呼而成。」

　　「彩」也指負傷後流出的血。《兒女英雄傳》第6回：「那時三兒在旁邊正呆呆的望着公子的胸脯子，要看這回刀尖出彩。」

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 采 indicates the sound; 彡 (hair) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 采 [ cǎi ] to collect, to gather; to pick, to pluck
    • 彡 [ shān ] hair; sunlight
①彩色，各种颜色。［例］朝辞白帝彩云间。——李白《早发白帝城》。［合］五彩；彩章(彩色涂饰)；彩错(色彩交错)；彩服。
②得好运。［例］且休提这恩德无涯，单则是子母团圆，大古里彩。——元·关汉卿《蝴蝶梦》。［合］彩气(吉利的兆头)；彩头(好运道的预兆；又指竞赛赢得的奖品)。
彩电 [ cǎi diàn ]: color TV

色彩(しきさい): colour, hue, tints

從「 彡 」，「 采 」聲，本義為文采。《說文》：「文章也。从彡，采聲。」《晉書‧夏侯湛傳贊》：「湛稱弄翰，縟彩雕煥。」 「 彩 」常表示光彩、色彩。《文選‧宋玉〈神女賦〉》：「目略微眄，精彩相授，志態橫出，不可勝記。」李善注：「目略輕看，精神光采相授與也。」 「 彩 」可表示彩色飾物。《隋書‧音樂志中》：「車輅垂彩，旒袞騰輝。」 「 彩 」也表示博戲中擲骰子的勝色。唐段成式《酉陽雜俎‧怪術》：「宋居士說擲骰子咒云『伊諦彌諦彌揭羅諦』，念滿萬遍，彩隨呼而成。」 「 彩 」也指負傷後流出的血。《兒女英雄傳》第6回：「那時三兒在旁邊正呆呆的望着公子的胸脯子，要看這回刀尖出彩。」
From " 彡", " Cai" sound, the original meaning is literary talent. "Said Wen": "Articles. From 彡, picking sound." "Book of Jin-Xiahou Zhan Chuan Zhan": "Chan is called Nonghan, and the tape is carved in color. " Color" often means brilliance and color. "Selected Works‧Song Yu "Goddess Fu"": "The eyes are slightly stern, wonderful and brilliant, and the ambition is out, and it is invincible." Li Shan's note: "Slightly look down on the eyes, the spirit is also taught." " Color" can mean colored ornaments. "Sui Shu·Music History": "The chariots are hanging on the color, and the Dang is brilliant." " Color" also indicates the winning color of the dice roll in the game. Tang Duancheng's "Youyang Miscellaneous Miscellaneous-Strange Skills": "The layman of the Song Dynasty said that the dice-throwing curse cloud "Yi Tie Mi Tie Mi Jie Luo Tie" was chanted thousands of times, and the color was made with the call. " Cai" also refers to the blood shed after being injured. "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters" Chapter 6: "At that time, San'er was by the side staring blankly at the son's chest. It depends on the sharpness of the knife."

彩字的基本解释

彩
cǎi
各种颜色交织：彩云。彩虹。彩霞。彩绘。彩陶。彩绸。彩笔。彩车。彩蛋（ａ．画在鸡、鸭蛋壳上的工艺品；ｂ．方言，松花蛋）。彩灯。五彩缤纷。
五色的绸子：剪彩。
指赌博或某种竞赛中赢得的东西：彩金。彩票。得彩。
称赞、夸奖的欢呼声：喝（h?）彩。
花样，完美的成分：丰富多彩。文彩。
喻战士受伤流的血：挂彩。彩口。
指彩金：彩券。中（zh恘g ）彩。

彩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cǎi］
［《廣韻》倉宰切，上海，清。］
(1)光彩；色彩。
(2)彩色饰物。
(3)文彩。
(4)指负伤后流出的血。
(5)旧时博戏中掷骰子的胜色。
(6)引申指赌注。
(7)指竞技或游戏、猜谜所获的奖品。
(8)幸运。
(9)对高超技艺发出的赞美的叫声。
(10)旧指舞台演出时起点缀增彩作用的布景等道具或手法。

彩字的英文翻译

◎ 彩
color, variety

彩字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彡字部】　彩； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页363第21
【唐韻】【正韻】倉宰切【集韻】此宰切，?音采。【說文】文章也。从彡，采聲。【廣韻】光彩。【集韻】通作采。

彩字的源字形

彩字的起名意思

：各种颜色交织；称赞、夸奖的欢呼声；花样，完美的成分；光彩，光泽。

color
Basic explanation of words
color
cǎi
Various colors are intertwined: colorful clouds. rainbow. pink clouds. Painted. Faience. colored silk. Crayons. float. Easter eggs (a. Handicrafts painted on chicken and duck eggshells; b. Dialect, Songhua eggs). Colorful lights. Colorful.
Five-color silk: cutting the ribbon.
Refers to something won in gambling or a certain competition: jackpots. Lottery. Win the lottery.
Cheers of praise and praise: drink (h?) color.
Patterns, perfect ingredients: colorful. Wen Cai.
The blood that Yu Warrior was injured and shed: Hanging color. Caikou.
Refers to the jackpot: lottery coupons. Medium (zh恘g) color.
color
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cǎi］
["Guangyun" Cangzaiqie, Shanghai, Qing Dynasty. ]
(1) Brilliance; color.
(2) Colored ornaments.
(3) Wen Cai.
(4) Refers to the blood shed after being injured.
(5) The winning color of dice in old gambling games.
(6) By extension, it refers to betting.
(7) Refers to the prizes obtained in competitions, games, and guessing.
(8) Lucky.
(9) A cry of praise for superb skills.
(10) The old refers to props or techniques such as setting decorations to enhance the color of the stage performance.
color

color, variety

цвет
căi
тень
Цвет | цвет
Кай
Свинец…
cǎi
I сущ.
1) цвет, раскраска, краски
五彩 пять цветов
奇彩 удивительные краски
2) украшения; оформление (из материи); декорации
剪彩 разрезать ленту (церемония при открытии выставки и т.п.)
3) приз; выигрыш; пари; ставка (в игре)
他得二彩 он получил второй приз
赌彩 держать пари
4) одобрительный возглас, «браво»
喝了一个彩 крикнуть «браво»
5) слава, почёт
讨些彩 добиться некоторого почёта (славы)
6) рана, ранение (на фронте)
挂了彩了 получить фронтовое ранение
7) сияние, блеск
月彩 сияние луны
8) облик; манеры
神彩 облик святого
II прил.
1) яркий, разноцветный, пёстрый, узорчатый; красочный; цветастый
彩绸 цветастый шёлк
2) яркий, блестящий
彩章 блестящее сочинение
Radicals: 木, 彡  (tree, hair, cleat)
Meaning Mnemonic
You use a cleat to climb a tree and your hair gets the same coloring as the foliage because your hair is like a chameleon. The coloring of your hair changes to whatever color is around you, so you use your cleats to climb trees to make your hair turn green and brown, and in the fall, yellow and orange and red!
Imagine digging your cleats into the bark of the tree until you get high enough for your hair to start coloring itself tree colors. It might be a lot of work, but it's worth it.
Reading Mnemonic
This cool coloring can only happen because you turned yourself into a cyborg (さい). Your hair and scalp are now made of high tech parts, not human ones.
You couldn't take the pain of losing your cyborg, so you've become one. Your robo-hair can change its coloring, but soon you'll be even more cyborg-y than before!
